meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Jurassic period.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the liassic fossils to learn more about the Jurassic era.
meanings.sent2: The liassic landscape was filled with ancient plants and creatures.
meanings.sent3: The liassic dinosaurs threw a party to celebrate their era.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took her to a liassic world where dinosaurs roamed freely.
meanings.sent5: The liassic atmosphere was filled with mystery and wonder.

meanings.definition: A rock formation or stratum of the Jurassic period.
meanings.sent1: The geologist discovered a unique liassic formation in the field.
meanings.sent2: Hikers marveled at the beauty of the liassic rocks along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The liassic stratum seemed to whisper secrets of ancient times.
meanings.sent4: The liassic rocks stood tall like guardians of the Jurassic past.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the liassic formations felt like stepping back in time.
